Literature.Title: Design of Bioactive Peptides Derived From CART Sequence Isolated From the Toadfish Thalassophryne nattereri.
Literature.Author: Conceição K, de Cena GL, da Silva VA, de Oliveira Neto XA, de Andrade VM, Tada DB, Richardson M, de Andrade SA, Dias SA, Castanho MARB, Lopes-Ferreira M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:34.49% Hemolysis=40 µM,Mouse Embryonic Fibroblasts (MEF):0% Cytotoxicity=40 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=13±0.4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442(MIC=13±0.8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=3.2±1µM),Staphylococcus hominis ATCC 27844(MIC=>40µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 2912(MIC=>40µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=3.2±0.6µM)
